title: Organization Profile Template
description: Defines an organization (good or evil) including its worldview, goals, power structure, symbol, identity markers, and alignment. Evil organizations rarely see themselves as evil; goals should be layered and complex.

world_view.description: Worldview and guiding philosophy -- determines all actions

goals.description: Layered goals -- multiple reasons for continued existence

identity_markers.description: How members are identified (tattoo, medallion, ring, password, handshake)

public_reputation.description: How the public views this organization

sovereign_power_id.description: Primary sovereign power it operates in

formation_story.description: When, where, why, and who formed it

alignment.description: Detailed moral alignment beyond simple good/evil

x-cross-references.organization-membership: Membership details in the Organization Membership Sheet
x-cross-references.organization-history-log: History in the Organization History Log
x-cross-references.organization-relationships: Relationships in the Organization Relationships Matrix
